never found any use for going over that stuff.
Not that there's anything wrong with it.
I don't think it's self-indulgent, self-pitying, or any other damn thing.
translation.it: Non significa essere autoindulgenti o autocommiserarsi. Ma non posso permettermelo.

translation.en: I just can't afford it.
translation.it: o autocommiserarsi. Ma non posso permettermelo.

translation.en: So I don't do it.
Ah, it doesn't matter where it begins. [sniffs]
You're right. [grunts]
What matters...
is what happens next.
What's the next line going to read?
No line. Berquist wants it deleted.
translation.it: Non ci sarà. Berquist vuole cancellarla.

translation.en: Berquist is a... [sighs]
a legislative branch kind of man.
The most he can ever hope for, and he won't succeed, is the House of Reps.
translation.it: Può sperare, ma non accadrà, di fare il deputato.

translation.en: Not the Senate, because nobody likes him.
translation.it: Non il senatore, perché lo odiano tutti.

translation.en: All he'll ever be is one out of 435.
But you...
You're an executive branch kind of man, Treat.
translation.it: Tu sei da ramo esecutivo, Treat.

translation.en: This office,
or a bigger one a whole lot like it, that's what I bet.
translation.it: o da uno più importante, ci scommetto.

translation.en: Don't get in the way of Berquist's agenda.
[Shultz] If it doesn't serve you.
I think Berkie's little side project...
translation.it: Credo che l'altro progetto di Berkie

translation.en: will serve you in a way you have not yet foreseen.
translation.it: lo sarà in un modo che ancora non comprendi.

translation.en: Let him get his hands dirty.
translation.it: Lascia che si sporchi le mani.

translation.en: -[eating] He's aiming for one out of 435. -Very good.
translation.it: - Lui punta a essere uno fra 435. - Molto bene.

translation.en: You're aiming for one out of one.
[eating] Just remember...
You, me, Berquist...
we're all having the same dish.
But you'd be better off...
using a spoon.
Scrape down the sides,
no remainders.
Nothing missed.
At what hotel are you staying?
Yeah, Ramada,
uh, Royale Caribe, InterCon... Ramada. Ramada.
translation.it: - il Royale Caribe, l'InterCon... - Il Ramada.

translation.en: We had a real life, and now we don't.
translation.it: Avevamo una vita vera. Ora no.

translation.en: And just because I'm your daughter, I'm supposed to like it, and I don't.
translation.it: Sono tua figlia e dovrei accettarlo, ma non è così.

translation.en: -Cat-- -[Cat] No.
What exactly did you have in Malibu that you don't have now?
translation.it: Cosa avevi a Malibu che ora non hai?

translation.en: You could open the door and be at the beach,
translation.it: Aprivo la porta ed ero al mare,

translation.en: in the Jacuzzi, or the tennis court.
translation.it: o nella Jacuzzi, o sul campo da tennis.

translation.en: [sighs] Anything else?
The three cars. We had three cars.
translation.it: Le tre auto. Avevamo tre auto.

translation.en: Fine.
A Jacuzzi, a tennis court, and three cars. Is that your idea of a real life?
translation.it: Jacuzzi, campo da tennis, tre auto. È la tua idea di vita vera?

translation.en: [Elena] I'm sorry, sweetie, that wasn't... That wasn't what I--
[cries] My father. I had my father, thank you very much.
translation.it: Mio padre. Avevo mio padre, grazie tante.

translation.en: Checking in. McMahon, Elena. I called earlier.
Fresh cut coco!
Coco!
[woman] Name tag?
Happy Fourth of July. Name tag?
Happy Fourth of July.
Happy Fourth of July.
Tomorrow morning is too late. I need to speak to someone now.
translation.it: Domattina è troppo tardi. Devo farlo ora.

translation.en: I-I need the passport immediately so I can return to the States.
translation.it: Mi serve un passaporto per tornare a casa.

translation.en: Ma'am, I'm sorry. All offices are closed today for the Fourth of July picnic.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Gli uffici sono chiusi per il picnic.

translation.en: That's happening here, right?
-Yes, ma'am. -So I can speak to someone now.
No, ma'am, there are no appointments today.
But I wouldn't need an appointment to just speak to someone at the picnic, right?
translation.it: Ma non mi serve per parlare con qualcuno a un picnic, no?

translation.en: Theoretically, ma'am, but I can't let you in without a passport.
translation.it: Teoricamente no, ma non può entrare senza passaporto.

translation.en: [sobs] Wh-- Just--
Fine, fine.
What can I get started for you?
[Treat] I'll have an Early Times and soda, please.
translation.it: Un whisky e soda, per favore.

translation.en: I was just leaving.
Too late now.
Is that a last meal?
Thank you.
Read any news today?
Interesting scoop from a friendly agent about a woman no one seems to know.
translation.it: Uno scoop interessante di un amico su una donna che nessuno sembra conoscere.

translation.en: No record of departing the States, brief stay at a hotel in San José,
translation.it: Non risulta aver lasciato gli USA, breve sosta a San José,

translation.en: false passport, slipped past Antiguan Immigration.
translation.it: passaporto falso, supera la dogana di Antigua.

translation.en: Fascinating.
You ready to go on record with any of that, Mr. Morrison?
translation.it: Pronto a dichiararlo pubblicamente, sig. Morrison?

translation.en: Already have.
Reporter by the name of Guerrero, Atlantic Post.
So you're connected. [chuckles]
Well, my usual target's been out of touch, but I hear she's--
translation.it: Il mio contatto non c'era, ma lei...

translation.en: Is it normal for you to be a step behind?
translation.it: È usuale per te essere un passo indietro?

translation.en: Wait for someone like me to be in a bind,
translation.it: Aspettare che una come me sia nei guai,

translation.en: squeeze a bit of distress into the math so it feels urgent all of a sudden?
translation.it: renderle la vita ancora più difficile, per metterle pressione?

translation.en: Something you can sink your well-filed teeth into
translation.it: Qualcosa in cui poter affondare i denti,

translation.en: while a secretary forwards your calls?
translation.it: mentre la segretaria passa le chiamate ad altri?

translation.en: Could be.
But if you had to pick someone with a byline to drop classified intel with, wouldn't you pick you?
translation.it: Ma, per pubblicare informazioni segrete... non sceglieresti te stessa?

translation.en: Pennsylvania Avenue reporter with a moral compass
capable of pointing off the campaign trail
and delivering a load of munitions in South America? [chuckles]
translation.it: per portare munizioni in Sud America?

translation.en: Must be worth reading.
You think?
I didn't realize you quasi-spook types did any reading.
translation.it: Non sapevo che le tue semi-spie leggessero.

translation.en: Not the brightest move, showing up at the embassy.
translation.it: Non sei stata furba a presentarti in ambasciata.

translation.en: In a perfect world, we'd make perfect choices.
translation.it: In un mondo perfetto, faremmo scelte perfette.

translation.en: In the real world, we make real choices. It's not a zero-sum deal.
translation.it: In quello reale, facciamo scelte reali. Non è un calcolo a somma zero.

translation.en: Wasn't that your entire thesis at last year's presentation
translation.it: Non era alla base della tua presentazione

translation.en: to the Council on Foreign Relations?
translation.it: al Consiglio per le relazioni estere?

translation.en: Did you cover that?
I covered many interesting happenings before my desk got frozen
translation.it: Seguivo cose interessanti, poi mi hanno bloccato l'inchiesta

translation.en: and I was relegated to following around the circus,
translation.it: e costretta a seguire il circo elettorale

translation.en: filing white propaganda about all the elephant shit.
translation.it: e pubblicare propaganda sulla merda di elefante.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. Fair enough.
Tell you what.
Let's, uh...
talk about other interesting happenings.
[Elena] Dick McMahon's my father.
I took his place on a ghost plane out of Fort Lauderdale on June 29th,
translation.it: Ho preso il suo posto su un volo fantasma da Fort Lauderdale il 29 giugno,

translation.en: 1:20 in the morning.
A big-bellied Lockheed
with enough guns, bullets, mines, and C-4 to take Managua.
translation.it: con abbastanza fucili, proiettili, mine e C-4 da conquistare Managua.

translation.en: I hustled into the open.
No payday.
No protection. No plan.
Just a game no one let me in on.
translation.it: Solo un gioco a me ignoto.

translation.en: A secret war.
Now I got a passport with a trick built into it and no ticket home.
translation.it: Ho un passaporto inservibile e nessun modo di tornare a casa.

translation.en: [Treat] That I know.
What I don't know is why you're still here.
translation.it: Ma non so perché sei ancora qui.

translation.en: I came for the money.
Stayed for the scoop.
Nice try.
I came for my father, stayed for the story.
translation.it: Sono venuta per mio padre e rimasta per la storia.

translation.en: Closer.
All right.
I don't know why I came.
But I stayed...
I... stayed because I was losing focus.
I can feel it happening again.
translation.it: Sento che sta accadendo di nuovo.

translation.en: I was...
[breathes raggedly] I was losing...
momentum on Catherine, my daughter.
And I knew that if I...
walked away from this...
I would just... I would just walk away from everything. I would just...
translation.it: ...avrei rinunciato a tutto il resto. Me ne sarei...

translation.en: walk away.
And all I want to know...
is what you're doing here.
What you're doing in the picture.
What...
if not stirring the pot?
[Treat] I thought you were the one.
[Elena] I thought you were the one.
I thought you were the one they sent to kill me.
I was ready.
Diane had a scar like this.
Then she just went. [sighs]
"The seal's wide spindrift gaze..."
Something,
"Galleons of Carib fire..."
Something, something.
"The seal's wide spindrift gaze towards paradise."
translation.it: "L'ampio sguardo spumoso della foca verso il paradiso"

translation.en: Diane loved poetry.
Alcestis.
Back from the tunnel and half in love with death.
translation.it: Tornò dall'Ade mezza innamorata della morte.

translation.en: Tomorrow.
Tomorrow what?
Tomorrow we leave.
-[Caribbean music plays] -[people chattering]
-[man] Come on. Give me this. -[woman] What? No.
translation.it: - Su. - Che c'è? - Dia qua. - No.

translation.en: -[man] This is the second time. -[woman] Can you give it back?
translation.it: - È la seconda volta. - Me lo ridai?

translation.en: [man] No. Come on.
-Yes. -No.
-No. -Listen, you can't sell here. No.
-[woman] Can I sell this? -[man] No, you can't sell this. No.
translation.it: E questo? - No. - Se ne vada. Ora.

translation.en: -Chalatenango. Unbelievable. -This is the second time.
translation.it: Chalatenango. - Assurdo. - È la seconda volta.

translation.en: Shit, at least when you drive a stake through a vampire's heart,
translation.it: Cazzo, se infili un paletto in un vampiro,

translation.en: -the fucker dies. -Hey.
-[man] Good time, man -[woman] Yeah, man.
-[man] Have a good night. -[woman] Catch you later.
Coming in tomorrow?
-No. -Give it back to me!
-Elena! -[gunfire]
[man over PA] Guests, please stay in your rooms...
translation.it: Gli ospiti dell'hotel sono pregati di restare...

translation.en: Your countrymen aren't your countrymen. There's no reason you should be here.
translation.it: Gli americani ti hanno tradita. Non c'è motivo di restare.

translation.en: But you can't tell me who you are or how you know any of this.
translation.it: Ma non puoi dirmi chi sei o come sai queste cose.

translation.en: I think they just spelled the story out in bullets, yes?
translation.it: Te l'hanno spiegato coi proiettili, no?

translation.en: [honks horn] Through there! Through there! Make we pass!
Make we pass! [honks horn]
Hey, make we pass, brethren!
[honking] Hey, make we pass, through there!
[Jones] Don't you see?
They had to give your father a figure big enough to lure him out.
translation.it: Hanno attirato tuo padre con una cifra assurda.

translation.en: A magical million-dollar payday.
He's a half-crazy old man in a sick season.
translation.it: Lui è mezzo pazzo e malato.

translation.en: -My father is not-- -[Jones] He's a man
with a well-documented history
of not caring where his merchandise showed up.
translation.it: di fregarsene della destinazione finale della merce.

translation.en: And so, he's a man very easily placed
translation.it: È stato facile farlo stare dalla parte sbagliata

translation.en: on the wrong side of whatever was supposed to happen.
translation.it: È stato facile farlo stare dalla parte sbagliata di ciò che doveva accadere.

translation.en: "Gunrunner bleeds out in... in-- in terrorist attack at Caribbean resort."
translation.it: "Trafficante d'armi muore in attentato in resort dei Caraibi."

translation.en: So what?
Who would miss him?
Who would care?
You?
File closed.
Finished and done.
[laughs] But you...
You, Elena...
But you showed up instead.
And the file is still closing.
translation.it: E il caso non è ancora chiuso.

translation.en: All the little scraps and pieces being assembled for the archive,
translation.it: Tutti i piccoli ritagli e pezzetti da ricomporre per gli archivi saranno dimenticati.

translation.en: to be forgotten.
translation.it: ritagli e pezzetti da ricomporre per gli archivi saranno dimenticati.

translation.en: And yours is the last name on it.
translation.it: E il tuo è l'ultimo nome.

translation.en: The passport, it--
The only trick of the passport was to keep you in play.
translation.it: Il suo unico scopo era tenerti in gioco.

translation.en: You could have got on a plane and left this place.
translation.it: Avresti potuto prendere un aereo e andartene.

translation.en: No, the passport wouldn't be valid for re-entry to the US, at which point you would have been taken.
translation.it: Ma il passaporto non sarebbe stato valido per rientrare e ti avrebbero presa.

translation.en: Rescued, rather, by the authorities, which gave you more of a reason to leave.
translation.it: Anzi, le autorità ti avrebbero salvata. Per questo dovevi andartene.

translation.en: But no.
You... you're still here.
All I have left is this story, I admit it.
translation.it: Mi resta solo questa storia, lo ammetto.

translation.en: Do you know who...
the unreported casualties of... of Vietnam were?
translation.it: ...erano le vittime non denunciate in Vietnam?

translation.en: The reporters...
who couldn't move past it.
[man] Hey, Jones.
All clear.
You can stay here. There's a phone across the square.
translation.it: Puoi restare qui. C'è un telefono in piazza.

translation.en: One day, maybe two.
I'll talk with my comrades on getting us a boat.
We are meant to survive beyond our stories.
Guerrero speaking.
-It's me. -[Alma] Elena?
Call Catherine's father. Call Wynn. When you hang up with me, call him.
translation.it: Chiama il padre di Catherine, Wynn, appena hai finito con me.

translation.en: Tell him to go to Catherine's school. Tell him to go get her.
translation.it: Digli di andare a scuola a prenderla.

translation.en: Tell him not to send anybody. Tell him he's gotta go himself, in person.
translation.it: Di non mandare altri. Deve andarci di persona.

translation.en: And tell him I need him to keep her, just until I get back.
translation.it: Deve badare a lei finché non tornerò.

translation.en: Done. Ellie...
Dick is dead.
I know.
[Alma] They moved him the night after you left. The hospital wouldn't let me see him.
translation.it: L'hanno trasferito dopo la tua partenza. Non ho potuto vederlo.

translation.en: And then I wasn't sure if I should reach you or if reaching you would expose you, but...
translation.it: Non sapevo come rintracciarti o se ti avrei messa in pericolo.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Elena. But listen.
My sources are telling me that there is a French intelligence operative down there
translation.it: Secondo le mie fonti, c'è una spia francese lì.

translation.en: investigating the same thing that we are.
Okay? I don't have a name yet,
translation.it: Ok? Non ho ancora un nome,

translation.en: but they could get you a special visa and get you out of there.
translation.it: ma potrebbe procurarti un visto speciale e farti uscire da lì.

translation.en: [sighs] These people are starting to move faster.
The InterCon assassination attempt...
-I was there. -[Alma] I know.
I know. Look, we're all over it down here. But you should be safe for now.
translation.it: Facciamo il possibile, ma dovresti essere al sicuro per ora.

translation.en: They're beefing up the military presence.
No, the military was already there in full force before the attempt.
translation.it: No, erano già qui prima dell'attentato.

translation.en: They knew it was coming.
And I was meant to be there.
Two birds, one stone. The file closes. [Alma] What?
translation.it: - Due piccioni con una fava. Caso chiuso. - Cosa?

translation.en: The date on my bogus passport's the same day Dick died.
translation.it: Il passaporto falso riportava la data della morte di Dick.

translation.en: [Alma] Okay, calm down.
Listen. Just stay where you are for now.
translation.it: Ascoltami. Per ora, resta dove sei.

translation.en: "Gunrunner bleeds out in terrorist attack."
You showed up instead.
translation.it: Tu hai preso il suo posto.

translation.en: [Alma] Hello?Elena?
Elena? Hello?
There are two things I need you to know right away.
The first thing I need you to know is that you get to go back to Malibu.
translation.it: La prima è che tornerai a Malibu.

translation.en: Your dad's coming to pick you up.
Do not go with anyone except your dad. Do you understand?
translation.it: Devi andare con lui e nessun altro, va bene?

translation.en: The second thing I need you to know...
translation.it: La seconda cosa che devi sapere...

translation.en: is that I love you.
Sometimes... [inhales] we argue and... about things, but I...
I think you know...
I only argue because I want your life to be happy and good.
translation.it: ...che lo faccio solo perché tu abbia una vita felice.

translation.en: [cries] Want you not to waste your time.
Not to waste your talent.
Not to let who you are get mixed up with anyone else's idea of who you should be.
translation.it: Non confondere chi sei con l'idea che gli altri si fanno di te.

translation.en: I know you're nodding.
I love you the most. You're my Kit-Cat.
translation.it: Ti voglio tanto bene. Sei la mia Kit-Cat.

translation.en: Everything's set. A car will take you.
translation.it: È tutto pronto. Ti porterà un'auto.

translation.en: His name is Paul. He's expecting you.
translation.it: Si chiama Paul. Ti sta aspettando.

translation.en: No one will look for you there. Now, I've been working with the consulate.
translation.it: Nessuno ti cercherà lì. Sto lavorando col consolato. Te ne andrai fra pochi giorni.

translation.en: We're gonna extract you in the next few days.
translation.it: Sto lavorando col consolato. Te ne andrai fra pochi giorni.

translation.en: If anything happens, don't come to me. It's too dangerous for you here.
translation.it: Non venire da me in nessun caso. È troppo pericoloso.

translation.en: I'll come to you. Okay?
Can I help you?
Hi.
Uh, I'm Elise. Elise Meyer.
Highly recommended Elise Meyer of Miami?
translation.it: La Elise Meyer di Miami consigliata da tutti?

translation.en: Get up here. Let's get you started already.
Who wants to be sitting around a bunch of jarheaded machos downtown
translation.it: Chi vuole stare in mezzo a un branco di soldati in città,

translation.en: when you can live right on the edge of paradise?
translation.it: quando si può vivere ai confini del paradiso?

translation.en: So, this job is not complicated at all.
translation.it: Il lavoro non è per niente complicato.

translation.en: Each day, 10:00 a.m. sharp,
routinely,
pick us up fruit from the vendor at Heritage Market.
translation.it: prendi della frutta al mercato Heritage.

translation.en: I can get it from closer.
No, Heritage Market. Thank you.
Guavas from the stall near the entrance.
Uh, pick us up newspapers from the little woman two streets over.
translation.it: Compra i quotidiani dalla donnina a due strade da lì.

translation.en: And get all the newspapers. I like to be well-read.
translation.it: Tutti quanti. Mi piace essere informato.

translation.en: Plus, when guests come, we want to be prepared.
translation.it: E poi, vogliamo essere preparati per quando ci sono ospiti.

translation.en: And, uh, let me see.
We have a cook, Evelina,
who comes every day at five and handles supper,
translation.it: Viene ogni giorno alle 5:00. È compito suo preparare la cena. Ma, ecco...

translation.en: so you don't need to worry about that. But just, you know...
translation.it: È compito suo preparare la cena. Ma, ecco...

translation.en: tidy things.
I could wipe the chairs.
They said you were sharp.
Do you know this?
Gary Geld, composer. Peter Udell and Ossie Davis did the book.
translation.it: Musiche di Gary Geld, libretto di Peter Udell e Ossie Davis.

translation.en: It's delicious.
Melba Moore version was my favorite.
translation.it: Adoravo la versione di Melba Moore.

translation.en: Melba Moore was criminally underrated.
Pas de critics.
So anyway, all that should take you through 2:00 p.m. every day.
translation.it: In questo modo, tutti i giorni, dovresti arrivare alle 14:00.

translation.en: And no shortcuts. Pas de shortcuts.
translation.it: E niente scorciatoie. Pas de scorciatoie.

translation.en: After that, your day is your own.
translation.it: Dopo puoi fare quello che vuoi.

translation.en: Isn't this lovely?
What could be lovelier?
translation.it: Cosa può esserci di più piacevole?

translation.en: Take the day.
Get settled in.
Oh, and, uh... be kind to the generator.
We need lights, but not every day.
translation.it: La luce non serve tutti i giorni.

translation.en: I only do the petrol run once a week and I want to keep it that way.
translation.it: Compro la benzina una volta a settimana, non più spesso.

translation.en: [Paul] Elise, happy hour!
Coming!
[Paul] Happy, happy hour.
[Paul] It was complicated. I could tell you stories.
translation.it: Non era semplice. Potrei raccontarti delle storie.

translation.en: -[Elena chuckles] No. -I'm not gonna say any names, but...
if I did tell you the names,
-you'd recognize every single one of them. -[laughs]
And then, there was Haiti,
which I adored.
I was mostly single there, of course.
translation.it: Lì ho fatto lo scapolo, ovviamente.

translation.en: Just a man about town.
I ran the first, and...
for all I care to know, the only
first-rate gay bathhouse in all of Port-au-Prince.
translation.it: sauna gay di prim'ordine di tutta Port-au-Prince.

translation.en: And again, no names,
but my patrons were some of the most major operators on Wall Street,
translation.it: ma i miei habitué erano fra i maggiori imprenditori di Wall Street,

translation.en: the hottest of the hot, motion picture,
translation.it: gli attori dei film più famosi

translation.en: and agents and executives. I mean, the biggest.
translation.it: e poi agenti e dirigenti. I più importanti.

translation.en: Of all the places, you know?
translation.it: Di tutti i luoghi in cui ho vissuto...

translation.en: I feel like that...
could have been the place.
But then I got scared away when dead chickens started showing up on my gate.
translation.it: Ma poi sono fuggito via quando mi hanno recapitato polli morti.

translation.en: I mean, I may not be the smartest Nellie on the block,
translation.it: Non sarò la checca più intelligente che ci sia,

translation.en: but, hey, when I see a dead chicken,
translation.it: ma, quando vedo un pollo morto,

translation.en: I know what it means.
I know how to take a hint.
Pas de voodoo.
Pas de Port-au-Prince,
so I ended up here.
Bob set me up.
We did a great business.
Every room was filled every single weekend.
translation.it: L'hotel era pieno tutti i week-end.

translation.en: And for a while, we ran a beautiful trade with the European set.
translation.it: E, per un po', abbiamo trattato con gli europei.

translation.en: But then, a few neighbor-island coups and bombings later,
translation.it: Poi, dopo qualche colpo di stato nelle isole vicine,

translation.en: it trickled down to the backpackers, and then...
translation.it: siamo rimasti con gli escursionisti e...

translation.en: several State Department warnings later, and we were down to this.
translation.it: ...dopo gli avvertimenti del Dipartimento di Stato, siamo a questo.

translation.en: So, why did you stay?
Why are you still here?
I could ask you the same question.
But me, I...
I guess I stayed because I have a very,
very high tolerance for pleasure.
Tell Evelina to set the table for three tonight.
translation.it: Di' a Evelina di apparecchiare per tre.

translation.en: My friend is coming.
Who's that?
My friend. The one I told you about?
translation.it: L'amico di cui ti ho parlato.

translation.en: The other friend.
Be a dear, fetch me a refill.
[Paul] I mean, it's not like the vacancy sign
translation.it: Beh, sicuramente il cartello "stanze disponibili" mi costa molta corrente.

you think you have it covered,

it won't bring her back.
